articles.title: Change is brewing in the coffee industry. What lies ahead? - NPR
articles.description: Coffee growers are facing climate change, labor shortages and incomes below the poverty line. On International Coffee Day, we take stock of the industry behind the beverage.

articles.title: US Futures Slip as Washington Approaches Shutdown: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: S&P 500 and Nasdaq 100 index futures fell as the US government neared a shutdown after a stopgap funding bill to avoid the closure failed.

articles.title: Univision Goes Dark on YouTube TV - Variety
